TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlSerializationReadCallback extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function XmlSerializationReadCallback() As Object

summary.span: 类为了对 SOAP 编码的非根 XML 数据的类型进行反序列化而使用的委托。

span.span: Delegate used by the class for deserialization of types from SOAP-encoded, non-root XML data.
The object returned by the callback.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在初始化过程，.NET Framework XML 序列化基础结构动态生成并编译的临时类反序列化派生自类。During initialization, the .NET Framework XML serialization infrastructure dynamically generates and compiles a temporary class for deserialization derived from the class. 在此过程中，.NET Framework 生成实现的读取的方法委托。During this process, the .NET Framework generates read methods that implement the delegate. 它会因此对于某些.NET Framework 类型和 XML 数据类型，通过 SOAP 编码的 XML 序列并且不是根元素之间的映射。It does so for certain mappings between .NET Framework types and XML data types that are serialized through SOAP-encoded XML and are not root elements. 然后，根据需要，在反序列化过程中调用读取的方法。Then, as necessary, a read method is called during deserialization. 不要直接创建的实例类。Do not directly create instances of the class. SOAP 1.1 规范第 5 节中介绍了 SOAP 编码。SOAP encoding is described in Section 5 of the SOAP 1.1 specification.
